Summary: saw three lights that thought were stars move in inward spiral then became brighter
divs: Sighting Details I was driving down hwy 70 west bound. Thought i saw a star move. Pulled over opened sunroof. saw three lights appear to converge in a spiral pattern then become brighter. light slowly faded. not sure what it was but it was freakin' cool. I did see another vehicwele pulled over but couldnt tell if they were also watching.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in McEwen
There were no other sightings in McEwen on or around June 28th 2012
